extension.summary: Launches the Netflix Remote Controllerfrom within Kodi.
extension.description: Launches the Netflix Remote Controller from within Kodi - It will close or minimize Kodi, launch the Netflix Remote Controller and when is exited Kodi will restart or maximize, with the option to run programs pre/post launch. It works with Windows 10 only and requires the Metro app for Netflix. It also required the lateest version of Netflix Remote Controller from http://sticky-ux.com/apps/NetflixRemoteController/.
